name: Draw Your Own Game
description:
*Warning when clicking complete do not click the tick, click to the left of the button.  After publishing the game I have realised that the hit boxes of the Back button are very bad and it will make you go back instead of completeing the drawing.

In this game you will start by drawing the sprites for the game with all the given tools. Then you will play it like a classic platformer.

Controls:                                                                                                                                                                          Mouse in the drawing stage                                                                                                                                 AD to move left or right                                                                                                                                        Space to jump
